Posts.Content: Hi Elizabeth! I was diagnosed with bc at the age 29, the same age as yours. The type of bc is another, but I would like make a contact with you and to share your experiance. I live in Bulgaria and am at 31 now and scared! There is no info about bc patients at my age and that's why I'am looking for some support only in iternet! Best regards and congratilations for your mission! Ginka S.
Posts.Title: Fellow Survivors, Help me Reach my Goal!

Posts.Content: I am so sorry for your friend...I wish I could help with some info...but I could not at the moment...I am also bc patient and found a great support in another forum,maybe you will post there and found more info http://www.youngsurvival.org see the buletin board wish all the best to you and your friend
Posts.Title: Return Cancer
